title: Noam Chomsky in London Year 501
description:
I dont have the date of this early 1990s London talk by Noam Chomsky. He spoke on the 500 years of western imperialism since Christopher Columbus.

In this rare 1993 lecture in London, Noam Chomsky talks about 501 years of Western Imperialism since Christopher Columbus voyage of 1492.
